section.p: A policy activity represents the policy or program providing the coverage.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8900, CONF:10516 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8898, R2.1=CONF:1198-8898)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8899, R2.1=CONF:1198-8899)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8901, R2.1=CONF:1198-8901)
This id is a unique identifier for the policy or program providing the coverage
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8903), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Health Insurance Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.5.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:19185)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8902)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] performer such that it (CONF:8906)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF" (CONF:8907, R2.1=CONF:1198-8907)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:8908)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8909, R2.1=CONF:1198-8909)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:8914, R2.1=CONF:1198-8914), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Financially Responsible Party Type Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10416 DYNAMIC (CONF:15992, R2.1=CONF:1198-15992)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8910, CONF:10481)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] telecom (CONF:8911)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:8912, R2.1=CONF:1198-8912)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:1198-8913)
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10481)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:8961)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8963, R2.1=CONF:1198-8963)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @typeCode="PRF" (CONF:8961)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:8962)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8968)/@code="GUAR" Guarantor (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.110 HL7RoleClass) (CONF:16096)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8964, CONF:10482) such that it
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10482)
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10482)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] telecom (CONF:8965)
SHOULD include assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name AND/OR assignedEntity/representedOrganization/name (CONF:8967, R2.1=CONF:1198-8967)
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10482)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:8916)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COV" (CONF:8917, R2.1=CONF:1198-8917)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8918, R2.1=CONF:1198-8918)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:8921)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8922)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8923, R2.1=CONF:1198-8923), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Coverage Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.18877 DYNAMIC (CONF:16078, R2.1=CONF:1198-16078)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8956, R2.1=CONF:1198-8956)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:8932)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:8930)
If the member date of birth as recorded by the health plan differs from the patient date of birth as recorded in the registration/medication summary, then the member date of birth SHALL be recorded in sdtc:birthTime. (CONF:8933)
The time, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] low (CONF:8919, R2.1=CONF:1198-8919)
The time, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:8920, R2.1=CONF:1198-8920)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:8934, R2.1=CONF:1198-8934)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="HLD" (CONF:8935, R2.1=CONF:1198-8935)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8938, R2.1=CONF:1198-8938)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:8936, R2.1=CONF:1198-8936)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8937, R2.1=CONF:1198-8937)
This id is a unique identifier for the subscriber of the coverage (CONF:10120)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8925, R2.1=CONF:1198-8925)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8939, R2.1=CONF:1198-8939)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" (CONF:8940, R2.1=CONF:1198-8940)
The target of a policy activity with act/entryRelationship/@typeCode="REFR" SHALL be an authorization activity (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.19) OR an act, with act[@classCode="ACT"] and act[@moodCode="DEF"], representing a description of the coverage plan (CONF:8942, R2.1=CONF:1198-8942)
A description of the coverage plan SHALL contain one or more act/id, to represent the plan identifier, and an act/text with the name of the plan (CONF:8943, R2.1=CONF:1198-8943)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8898, R2.1=CONF:1198-8898)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8899, R2.1=CONF:1198-8899)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8901, R2.1=CONF:1198-8901)
This id is a unique identifier for the policy or program providing the coverage
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8903), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Health Insurance Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.5.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:19185)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8902)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] performer such that it (CONF:8906)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF" (CONF:8907, R2.1=CONF:1198-8907)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:8908)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8909, R2.1=CONF:1198-8909)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:8914, R2.1=CONF:1198-8914), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Financially Responsible Party Type Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10416 DYNAMIC (CONF:15992, R2.1=CONF:1198-15992)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8910, CONF:10481)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] telecom (CONF:8911)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:8912, R2.1=CONF:1198-8912)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:1198-8913)
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10481)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:8961)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8963, R2.1=CONF:1198-8963)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @typeCode="PRF" (CONF:8961)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:8962)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8968)/@code="GUAR" Guarantor (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.110 HL7RoleClass) (CONF:16096)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8964, CONF:10482) such that it
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10482)
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10482)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] telecom (CONF:8965)
SHOULD include assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name AND/OR assignedEntity/representedOrganization/name (CONF:8967, R2.1=CONF:1198-8967)
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10482)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:8916)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COV" (CONF:8917, R2.1=CONF:1198-8917)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8918, R2.1=CONF:1198-8918)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:8921)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8922)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8923, R2.1=CONF:1198-8923), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Coverage Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.18877 DYNAMIC (CONF:16078, R2.1=CONF:1198-16078)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8956, R2.1=CONF:1198-8956)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:8932)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:8930)
If the member date of birth as recorded by the health plan differs from the patient date of birth as recorded in the registration/medication summary, then the member date of birth SHALL be recorded in sdtc:birthTime. (CONF:8933)
The time, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] low (CONF:8919, R2.1=CONF:1198-8919)
The time, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:8920, R2.1=CONF:1198-8920)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:8934, R2.1=CONF:1198-8934)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="HLD" (CONF:8935, R2.1=CONF:1198-8935)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8938, R2.1=CONF:1198-8938)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:8936, R2.1=CONF:1198-8936)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8937, R2.1=CONF:1198-8937)
This id is a unique identifier for the subscriber of the coverage (CONF:10120)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8925, R2.1=CONF:1198-8925)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8939, R2.1=CONF:1198-8939)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" (CONF:8940, R2.1=CONF:1198-8940)
The target of a policy activity with act/entryRelationship/@typeCode="REFR" SHALL be an authorization activity (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.19) OR an act, with act[@classCode="ACT"] and act[@moodCode="DEF"], representing a description of the coverage plan (CONF:8942, R2.1=CONF:1198-8942)
A description of the coverage plan SHALL contain one or more act/id, to represent the plan identifier, and an act/text with the name of the plan (CONF:8943, R2.1=CONF:1198-8943)

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="640768665"/> <code codeSystemName=""/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.87"/> <assignedEntity> <id root="MDHT" extension="188796134"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.110" codeSystemName="HL7RoleClass"/> <telecom/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedEntity> </performer> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.88"/> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <assignedEntity> <id root="MDHT" extension="143116036"/> <code code="GUAR" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.110" codeSystemName="HL7RoleClass" displayName="Guarantor"/> <telecom/> </assignedEntity> </performer> <participant typeCode="COV"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.89"/> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <participantRole> <id root="MDHT" extension="1819798614"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> <playingEntity/> </participantRole> </participant> <participant typeCode="HLD"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.90"/> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <participantRole> <id root="MDHT" extension="1851649782"/> </participantRole> </participant> <entryRelationship typeCode="REFR"/> </act>
